article: mainland china has stepped up efforts to woo traditional overseas chinese communities , particularly those in north america , vietnam , cambodia and laos , according to a report prepared by the overseas chinese affairs commission -lrb- ocac -rrb- .
abstract: beijing steps up wooing overseas chinese communities
